abstract: Sergio Marchionne, the Italian auto executive who took over Chrysler as part of its government-backed bankruptcy, deplored the high interest rate the company’s paying with a controversial word.
snippet: Sergio Marchionne, the Italian auto executive who took over Chrysler as part of its government-backed bankruptcy, deplored the high interest rate the company’s paying with a controversial word.

headline.main: Chrysler Chief Apologizes for Comment on Terms of U.S. Loans

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
